ExtraOptions.Description: Transport to any single UK destination if your vehicle breaks down and can't be fixed at the roadside.
Cover on your driveway or within 1/4 mile from home.
Car hire, public transport or a hotel room if your vehicle breaks down and can't be fixed at the roadside.
Help with parts and garage bills after a breakdown. Cover up to 5 claims a year, each with up to £500 with a £35 excess. Excludes pre-existing faults.
